mapper.delete: UPDATE COURSETABLE SET ISDELETED='1' WHERE COURSE_ID =#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE COURSETABLE SET COURSE_NAME=#{course_Name}, COURSE_DESCRIPTION=#{course_Description}, TEACHER=#{teacher},STUDENT=#{student}, PUBLISHDATE=#{publishDate},TAG=#{tag}, COURSESOURCE=#{courseSource},COURSETYPE=#{courseType}, ISSELECTED=#{isSelected} WHERE COURSE_ID=#{course_Id} AND ISDELETED='0'

UPDATE COURSETABLE SET COURSE_NAME=#{course_Name}, COURSE_DESCRIPTION=#{course_Description}, TEACHER=#{userId},STUDENT=#{student}, PUBLISHDATE=#{publishDate},TAG=#{tag},ISSELECTED=#{isSelected} WHERE COURSE_ID=#{course_Id} AND ISDELETED='0'
mapper.select: SELECT A1.COURSE_ID,A1.COURSE_NAME,A1.COURSE_DESCRIPTION, A1.TEACHER,A1.STUDENT,A1.PUBLISHDATE,A1.TAG,A1.COURSESOURCE,A1.COURSETYPE,A1.ISSELECTED,A1.ISDELETED FROM COURSETABLE A1,USERTABLE A2 WHERE A1.ISDELETED=0 AND A1.ISSELECTED=1 AND A1.STUDENT=A2.USERID ORDER BY A2.STUNUMBER
